significance: The town where Gol D. Roger was born and executed, known as the 'Town of the Beginning and the End.' It is the last major town before entering the Grand Line.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Arrive in Loguetown
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates arrive in Loguetown to gather supplies before entering the Grand Line.

keyEvents.title: Roger's Execution Flashback
keyEvents.description: Smoker recalls witnessing Gol D. Roger's execution in this town, which sparked the Great Pirate Era.

historicalEvents: Site of Gol D. Roger's execution
Beginning of the Great Pirate Era

reveals.information: Final major town in East Blue before the Grand Line entrance
Birthplace and execution site of Pirate King Gol D. Roger
Known as the 'Town of the Beginning and the End'

name.japanese: ゴールド・ロジャー・バー

significance: An anime-original bar in Loguetown where Gol D. Roger drank the night before setting sail for the Grand Line. The owner renamed it in Roger's honor after his execution.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Visits Gold Roger Bar
keyEvents.description: Luffy visits the bar and hears stories about Roger from the owner Raoul, who personally served Roger.

keyEvents.title: Smoker Realizes Luffy's Identity
keyEvents.description: Smoker enters the bar after Luffy leaves and realizes the young man he helped was his target.

historicalEvents: Gol D. Roger drank here the night before sailing to the Grand Line

reveals.information: Was formerly a popular drinking spot for pirates, served Gol D. Roger

significance: The historic platform where Gol D. Roger was executed and spoke his famous last words that sparked the Great Pirate Era. A pilgrimage site for pirates.

keyEvents.title: Flashback to Roger's Execution
keyEvents.description: Smoker recalls witnessing Roger's execution on this platform as a child, where Roger announced the existence of his treasure 'One Piece.'

historicalEvents: Site of Gol D. Roger's execution
Where Roger announced the existence of One Piece

reveals.information: The exact location where Gol D. Roger was executed and spoke his final words
The platform marks the symbolic beginning of the Great Pirate Era

name.japanese: 武器屋 - ローグタウン

significance: A weapons shop in Loguetown where Zoro encounters Tashigi while searching for new swords.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Meets Tashigi at Weapon Shop
keyEvents.description: Zoro enters the weapon shop and meets Tashigi, who is examining swords and demonstrating her knowledge.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Discovers Tashigi's Resemblance to Kuina
keyEvents.description: In the weapon shop, Zoro sees Tashigi without her glasses and is shocked by her resemblance to Kuina.
